metadata.title: CVE-2019-9187 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ikiwiki before 3.20170111.1 and 3.2018x and 3.2019x before 3.20190228allows SSRF via the aggregate plugin. The impact also includes readinglocal files via file: URIs.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
